tags: the one true pairing we deserve
summary: Crack theory: The person steve got married to is...STEVE! He did so admire that ass. Had to go back for more. ;)
question: Crack theory: The person steve got married to is...STEVE! He did so admire that ass. Had to go back for more. ;)
answer: I mean, I’m not saying I really and truly need this fic in my life, but if it just so happened to come across my dash, I would feel honor-bound to read it.  That’s all I’m saying. :D

summary: Square Enix will finally unveil Marvel's Avengers at E3
title: Square Enix will finally unveil Marvel's Avengers at E3
body:
Square Enix will finally unveil Marvel’s Avengers at E3

Over two years after the undertaking was first declared, Square Enix will at long last hotshot its Marvel’s Avengers game at E3 this year.

You’ll have the option to watch the uncover amid Square Enix’s E3 live occasion, set for tenth June at 6pm Pacific (that is 2am on the eleventh here in Blighty).

What do we know? All things considered, the game has been foaming without end at Tomb…

View On WordPress

body:
Headcanon of the day

Sam and Bucky are the type of guys to sit in the car after a really rough mission they just sit in the car in silence and listen to Mr. Bright side by the killers.

summary: Stark And Lannister Are Working Alongside Sorcerer Supreme In The Upcoming Film '1917' Which Could Take The Box Office By Storm!
title: Stark And Lannister Are Working Alongside Sorcerer Supreme In The Upcoming Film '1917' Which Could Take The Box Office By Storm!
excerpt: Avengers: Endgame actor Benedict Cumberbatch, Colin Firth & Mark Strong (Kingsman Franchise), Andrew Scott, Richard Madden & Dean Charles Chapman (Game Of Thrones) are all set to appear in Sam Mendes next directorial, 1917. 1917 follows the story of two young British soldiers on a single day at the height of World War I. Steven Spielberg's Amblin Partners is producing the film through Dreamwork pictures brand.

blog.name: anti-endgame-ending
blog.title: i want to go back in time and snap endgame away
blog.description: mari | anti endgame blog | steve rogers stan | send your rants | i WAS a steggy shipper but I didn't even know what happened | i have a lot of steve ships | ALSO, i am not an anti of any character at all | if you like my blog, then maybe you'll like @mcurewrite better. it's a more organized and friendly blog! | check out @antiendgame too! we're affiliates! |

summary: i want to go back in time and snap endgame away
body:
Wherein He Was Driven to Madness

Based off of this post:

i want to go back in time and snap endgame away

Steve called for Mjolnir with all his might. The weapon finally flew into his battered hands, the force nearly twisting his whole upper body. He looked up at the Mad Titan above him, and positioned himself in a stance.

•

Steve didn’t mean to derail the group therapy session like that. He didn’t mean to talk about someone he cared deeply about many years ago, especially that they died before the Snap. He should have talked about Sam, Bucky or Sharon. They mean more to him now. He ran a shaking hand through his hair, sighing deeply.

All he said in the session was bullshit. He doesn’t think he can move on from his past. He’s lost. No matter how much therapy he leads or gets, he is still lost.

He went inside the quiet Avengers Compound, the eery silence caused by the depression still present after five years of loss. He went straight to Nat’s office in the heart of the building, seeing her crying over a peanut butter sandwich.

They lost – every single one of them.

•

He felt uncomfortable holding the hammer. It’s like it’s almost refusing him. Lightning coursed through his arm, so he took that as a cue to start attacking the enemy.

Thanos broke through his shield with simple blunt strokes of his double-edged sword, accidentally slashing a deep gash on his arm.

He stood up, tightening the strap of his shield to stop the bleeding. He stood up and faced Thanos and his army.

Whatever it takes.

•

He didn’t know why he brought this compass again. He knows it’s a hazard: it’s small and it can fall through his pocket. But he felt compelled to do it. He shook his head, shoving it into his utility belt.

What he didn’t know that it will fall at the worst time. He quickly ran to save the metal case, his other self followed suit.

“Where did you get this?” he asked, holding a physical piece of his regret.

I got it from the past, Steve.

He didn’t answer, instead, he pounced on him to get it back. But, his past self got him in a choke hold.

Steve internally cringed at what he’s about to do. Bucky doesn’t deserve to be a pawn.

But…

“Bucky’s alive,” he choked out. He was released.

•

“On your left,” came Sam’s faint voice over the comms.

Steve felt relief flood over him. He knew he can’t take on Thanos and his army alone, but God helo him, he’s still willing ti do it.

Peggy flashed through his mind – it was forceful and borderline maddening. He forgot about Bucky, Sam, and Sharon. He forgot about saying sorry to Tony. He forgot about Nat. He forgot about his family. All in his mind was to win the fight and go back in time to marry her. To have children with her. To dance with her. He doesn’t care about the consequences anymore. To hell with her husband. Or her children. Or his mental health. Real men do not show weakness, a voice told him. All they need is a woman.

Bucky and Sam are near him. All he needs is to look. But he didn’t spare a glance.

He tried to snap out of it.

“Avengers!” he boomed. And then he continued, “Assemble.”

Thor let out a war cry of a god, raising Stormbreaker up to the sky.

•

Watching her talk to her coworkers in a friendly and cordial manner, he thought that she really had a life. He doesn’t have the right to take that from her – it doesn’t matter if she has a picture of him on her desk.

Her desk had three picture frames. Him, her wedding photo with her husband, and her children.

But maybe, just maybe, he can talk to her. The door is just a reach away.

No, Steve. No. You can’t. You’ve done enough messing with timelines.

He accepted his past, present and future. And walked away.

•

“Don’t do anything stupid till I get back,” he said, the voice in his head telling him to recycle those words from years before.

“How can I? You take all the stupid with you,” Bucky recalled. His words were followed with a weak “I’ll miss you, buddy”.

They hugged, but Steve felt repulsed. Bucky, however, tried to stop himself from looking sorrowful.

Bucky wished the hug lasted longer.

“You’re a good man,” Steve said to Sam.

Sam felt a tinge of alarm when he heard it. Those were the first words he said to him. And they were void of any emotion at all.

Steve attempted not to look excited when he stepped onto the platform. He’s finally getting his prize for winning the war. They’ll have children, and they’ll dance forever. She’ll heal his trauma and his sadness. A happily ever after.

He closed his helmet and disappeared, leaving everyone.

Le fin?

@dreamdragon48 💙

summary: In avengers world, Coke Zero has this too and Hawkeye gets reminded of his best girl whenever he forgets about this and buys a...
body:
In avengers world, Coke Zero has this too and Hawkeye gets reminded of his best girl whenever he forgets about this and buys a can. Eventually, he buys more of them cause though it’s torture it reminds him that people around the world are remembering the good things she was brave enough to turn things in her life around to go do, and it is absolutely disrespectful of him to just snivel away cause it’s his job as someone who’s shared as many years with the black widow and received as much support as he has to be proud of her spirit and live with it as an example: be brave and willing to try to love.

You’ll be remembered

reblog.comment:
In avengers world, Coke Zero has this too and Hawkeye gets reminded of his best girl whenever he forgets about this and buys a can. Eventually, he buys more of them cause though it’s torture it reminds him that people around the world are remembering the good things she was brave enough to turn things in her life around to go do, and it is absolutely disrespectful of him to just snivel away cause it’s his job as someone who’s shared as many years with the black widow and received as much support as he has to be proud of her spirit and live with it as an example: be brave and willing to try to love.

You’ll be remembered

tags: i will tag spoilers if needed
but I'm not going to keep it up if not
summary: FYI: I plan on discontinuing my Endgame Spoilers tag this week.  The movie’s been out for a month now.  People who were avoiding...
body: FYI: I plan on discontinuing my Endgame Spoilers tag this week.  The movie’s been out for a month now.  People who were avoiding spoilers have most likely seen it by now.  If you still are working to avoid spoilers, and need me to keep up the tag, let me know (message me, send me an ask - anon or not, reblog or reply to this post).  Otherwise, they’ll start to go untagged starting this weekend.

reblog.comment: FYI: I plan on discontinuing my Endgame Spoilers tag this week.  The movie’s been out for a month now.  People who were avoiding spoilers have most likely seen it by now.  If you still are working to avoid spoilers, and need me to keep up the tag, let me know (message me, send me an ask - anon or not, reblog or reply to this post).  Otherwise, they’ll start to go untagged starting this weekend.

trail.content: FYI: I plan on discontinuing my Endgame Spoilers tag this week.  The movie’s been out for a month now.  People who were avoiding spoilers have most likely seen it by now.  If you still are working to avoid spoilers, and need me to keep up the tag, let me know (message me, send me an ask - anon or not, reblog or reply to this post).  Otherwise, they’ll start to go untagged starting this weekend.
